Company DescriptionLocation: RemoteREF24928OJob DescriptionThe primary role of the Sr. Manager, Analytics & Consulting in our Revenue Management Practice Area is to lead our small and emerging clients in the activation and support of the Byzzer Pricing solution.They will be responsible for all aspects of client activation including onboarding and training new clients, consulting with clients on how to best utilize the software dashboards for pricing decisions, creating use case training material, responding to in-depth client questions and leading proactive retention measures for client renewals.This position is remote and involves <20% travel.About ByzzerByzzer, powered by NielsenIQ, is a subscription-based platform that provides actionable insights that help small and emerging consumer packed goods (CPG) businesses drive growth and market share.Responsibilities:Onboarding/DeliveryTrain client on self-serve functionality and how to make their key business decisions using the platformConsult with the client on the concepts covered in the sales storyContinuous Support/TrainingConduct webinar trainings on key topics focusing on pricing and promotion strategies and tacticsBuild and update resources on topics that are pertinent to client pricing issuesRespond to clients on more advanced pricing questionsCollaborate with clients in the use of the software to help in their decision making. The expectation is to guide the client in what to do, not to conduct the analysis for the clientProactive RetentionUnderstand client usage of the pricing analytics dashboards to assist in client renewals. Partner with others if low usage or sentiment indicate a possible renewal riskPartner with product and marketing on how to continue to drive client value, usage of analytics and ultimately salesQualificationsBachelor’s degree requiredMBA or advanced/analytics degree preferred4-8 years of relevant experience in Market Research, Consumer Packaged Goods, Consulting or AnalyticsStrong analytic background, preferably in pricing and promotionAble to teach core Pricing and Promotion and assortment concepts to a client with various levels of experienceStrong Customer Success experienceAble to guide a client through how to use data for fundamental business decisionsConfidently can connect onboarding sessions 1-1 with clients and multiclient webinarsAble to balance multiple clients at onceAdditional InformationAll your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.About NielsenIQNielsenIQ is a global measurement and data analytics company providing the most complete and trusted view of consumers and markets in 90 countries covering 90% of the world’s population. Focusing on consumer-packaged goods manufacturers and FMCG and retailers, we enable customers to defy what’s possible. How? We combine unparalleled datasets, pioneering technology, and the industry’s top talent to create insights that unlock innovation. Join us and change the landscape.Learn more at: www.niq.comWant to keep up with our latest updates? Follow us on: LinkedIn | Instagram | Twitter | FacebookOur commitment to Diversity, Equity, and InclusionNielsenIQ is committed to reflecting the diversity of the clients, communities, and markets we measure within our own workforce. We exist to count everyone and are on a mission to systematically embed inclusion and diversity into all aspects of our workforce, measurement, and products. We enthusiastically invite candidates who share that mission to join us.We are proud to be an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action-Employer, making decisions without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability status, age, marital status, protected veteran status or any other protected class. Our global non-discrimination policy covers these protected classes in every market in which we do business worldwide.Learn more about how we are driving diversity and inclusion in everything we do by visiting the NielsenIQ News Center: https://nielseniq.com/global/en/news-center/diversity-inclusion/
